Html:
Thank you. I am using your project very well.

When I create route, some margins between Top, left, right, bottom of route and map happen.

sometimes, route fill only 50% area of the map.

so. I want to remove them and fill route points on map tightly.

What Can I do it? or decide Map Boundary with Latitude, longitude, not zoom.

Always thank you for your work.

;} Sorry.

When I call ﻿ZoomAndCenterRoute in GMapControl class,

s﻿ometimes I see zoom level is mismatch with boundary I set Map Rectangle.

Below is my code.

﻿            MapRoute rount = new MapRoute(new List(), "TEST");
            rount.Points.Add(new PointLatLng(locRect.sp.y, locRect.sp.x));
            rount.Points.Add(new PointLatLng(locRect.ep.y, locRect.ep.x));

            this.ZoomAndCenterRoute(rount);

locRect.sp and ep are TopLeft and bottomRight LatLng of objects I want to draw on Map.
After loading tiles, I draw my objects with GPS info in ﻿OnPaintOverlays().
But, When I draw these objects on zoomed map, they display only in middle of map and doesn't place near boundary.
I would like to fill up my objects on the map. but I don't know how to do.
Do you understand me? Thank you.

Thanks.

But, It seems that marker and route has same internal routine. 

Could you explain difference ?
